Name: Anyone There?
About the game: 'Anyone there ?' is an Immersive first-person horror game where a Creature is after you. Find his identity by scanning the clues scattered around the abandoned school. Cancel the ritual that created it. Be wary because you never know when or where the creature is going to catch you. Investigate this school and find out the truth. Your tablet is your only weapon to unravel this mystery and collect some informations that will lead you to the resolution of the investigation. Features : - Investigate - Be silent or hide if you have no other choice - Tag the places you have already been to avoid getting lost in this labyrinthine school - Use your tablet to collect clues - Find the place where the ritual took place to cancel it - Leave this school alive...
